member.returns: Index of the current location information in the collection.

member.summary: Moves to the previous location in the stored history collection.

member.returns: Index of the current location information in the collection.

member.summary: Adds specified location to the history collection.

Text in the code at specified location.

Visual element related to the forward navigation.

member.summary: Updates visual history elements accordingly the new history index.

Visual element related to the forward navigation.

member.name: M:Alternet.Editor.Common.NavigationHistory.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Prevents navigation history updating until calling EndUpdate method.

member.name: M:Alternet.Editor.Common.NavigationHistory.EndUpdate
member.summary: When implemented by a class, re-enables navigation history updating turned off by calling BeginUpdate method.
